title: Watch out for the Automobile | DETECTIVE TRAGICOMEDY

sources.title: Watch out for the Automobile | DETECTIVE TRAGICOMEDY
sources.description:
Insurance agent Yury Detochkin, a crystal-clear and naive person, goes out on the warpath with bribe-takers and profiteers. Driven by a sense of justice, he acts in a peculiar manner, stealing cars from people who acquired them unfairly, selling them, and passing the money to orphanages. In the prosecutor’s office, the cases of these thefts are handled by Detective Podberyozovikov, a friend of Detochkin’s...

Year of production: 1966

Directed by: Eldar Ryazanov
Written by: Eldar Ryazanov, Emil Braginsky
Directors of photography: Vladimir Nakhabtsev, Anatoly Mukasei
Production designers: Boris Nemechek, Lev Semyonov
Music: Andrey Petrov
Starring: Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Oleg Efremov

#Soviet_comedy #detective_tragicomedy #Russian_cinema #FullMoviesWithEngSubs
